top_categories.workout_context: 180 miles. Your legs will beg to quit after 120. This trains the power output you need from mile 130 onward.
67ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
At Ardenne Gravel Stages, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
Ardenne Gravel Stages' Belgian Ardennes, Multi-stage forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 180 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Ardenne Gravel Stages' demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before September.
12,000ft of climbing on grades that change every minute. You need to switch from seated to standing without losing rhythm.
180 miles rewards fat oxidation. This volume work shifts your fuel mix so you're still burning fat at hour 5, not bonking at hour 3.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Ardenne Gravel Stages. Train it until it feels boring.
Every hard session works better with a bigger aerobic base. At 180 miles, base fitness is the difference between racing and surviving.
Endurance with intensity spikes baked in. Exactly what 12,000ft of climbing on belgian Ardennes gravel does to your power file on race day.
12,000ft of climbing means repeated surges above threshold. VO2max work is how you survive the fifth climb, not just the first.
Low-cadence force work for 12,000ft of climbing. The slow, grinding ascents where you can't spin—you push.

race_overlay.nutrition: Ultra-distance fueling for 180 miles: 80–100g carbs/hour from mile 1 — don’t wait until you’re hungry. Practice your exact race-day nutrition in every long training ride. Carry backup calories. 180 miles burns 8,000–12,000+ calories — you cannot replace them all, but you must try.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Ardenne Gravel Stages requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on belgian ardennes gravel to build confidence. Expect: belgian ardennes, multi-stage, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Durability, TT Threshold, and Over Under to prepare you for 180 miles of belgian ardennes gravel in Vielsalm/Engreux, Belgian Ardennes.
